IdentityCredentialRequestOptions.summary: NOTE Experimental The IdentityCredentialRequestOptions dictionary represents the object passed to as the value of the identity option.

remarks.para: When an identity option is provided in a get() call made on a Relying party (RP) website, the user is offered a list of identity provider (IdPs) as sign-in options. Once the user signs in successfully using one of these options, the promise returned by the get() call returns an object.
